item.title: How to win friends and influence people by D. Carnegie
item.description: Are you struggling to convince people, to get them to say yes, this book by D. Carnegie might be for you. D. Carnegie proposes a catalogue of tips and tricks to better deal with people, including how to make people like you, how to win people to your way of thinking and, how to be a leader. These range from very simple things like smiling, to more skilful techniques such as asking questions instead of arguing (the Socratic method).
